bc.adjustris.name: Adjustris
bc.adjustris.desc: Like Tetris, but you can customize the pieces!
event.1: Hi, I'm just trying out this new game for the saloon. Let me show you.
event.3: Oh the blocks are falling!  Maybe I stack them up!
event.4: Well I'm not very good at it.  How about you take one of these games to play at home?
